meanings.definition: The act of making a cat-like sound.
meanings.sent1: The miaouing of the kitten was so cute.
meanings.sent2: I heard the miaouing of a cat outside my window last night.
meanings.sent3: The miaouing of the cat interrupted our conversation.
meanings.sent4: The eerie miaouing in the dark alley sent shivers down my spine.
meanings.sent5: The constant miaouing of the hungry cat was impossible to ignore.

meanings.definition: To make a high-pitched sound like a cat.
meanings.sent1: She was miaouing softly to call her pet cat.
meanings.sent2: The stray cat was miaouing loudly for food.
meanings.sent3: The child started miaouing to mimic the sound of a cat.
meanings.sent4: The wind howled, miaouing through the trees in the night.
meanings.sent5: The singer's voice miaouing in the high notes captivated the audience.
